name: Unity 2d Blend Tree movement
description:
Example for 2d top-down movement, using blend tree for animation ( 8 directions) and  NavMesh for find navigation

==== Click right mouse on gray background to select aim position or Using Arow (AWSD) on keyboard to controll ===

Scene create like mockup of Clash Royal battle scene and we have :

- blue zone: water

- white zone: static barrier

- red cube: the object have tag Fly  (fly over water)

- white cube: the object have tag Jump (jump over water)

-brown cube: normal object 

Art from: https://mome-g.itch.io/8dir-char
Github: https://github.com/huynhdoquang/blendTreeUnity
